noTasks: Seems like you have no tasks. You can create one, or go and get an ice cream!
noGroups: You haven't created any group yet. Separating your tasks into groups can make things easier. Try creating a group for work and another for pets!
noHabits: You have no habits. Habits are the key for building a better you! Try something like "water my plants" or "read for 10 minutes".
emptyGroup: This group is empty. Create a task!
reminderDescription: A dialog box that shows up every time you open the app for the first time in a day.
reminderTitle: You have some habits for today!
reminderContent: You have {count, plural, one {# pending habit} other {# pending habits}}.
name: Name
emptyDaysError: What's the point of a habit if you're not gonna repeat it? Please select at least one day.
reminderTurnOn: You can turn this notification on again in the config page. Look for the "habit reminder" option.
